capability.name: Production Risk Models
capability.definition: This capability focuses on developing and refining production risk models to identify and detect potential exposures to procedural failures in business operations.
capability.role: Develop and refine production risk models to detect possible exposures to procedural failures
capability.example: Financial engineers respond to an analysis of production issues and develop/refine their production risk models to better detect the root cause

key_features.name: Development of production risk models
key_features.description: Enables development of production risk models to support this capability focuses on developing and refining production risk models to identify and detect potential exposures to procedural failures in business operations
